name: San Francisco Running Crew
description: Theatrical Production, Management & Design Training for youth ages 13-18. San Francisco Running Crew pairs youth ages 13–18 with professional mentors for hands-on training in technical theater and design. An immersive, creative experience, students learn an array of skills in theater production, including stage lighting, sound mixing, and set design construction.
